metadata.name: SEL Setup without Addons
metadata.description:
Fully configured setup based on Tamtaro's recommended filters, sort orders, and Standard SEL described [here](https://github.com/Tam-Taro/SEL-Filtering-and-Sorting). Designed for those with debrid or usenet services, while seeking the highest quality results, minimal clutter, and complete coverage even when options are few. 

 * **Comes with no addons, so using this template will not affect your addons page** 
 * For catalogs, check out my github for AIOMetadata configs
 * **â“˜ Review the Language filter**: Add your main languages to Preferred Languages, adjust ranking accordingly. 
 * I recommend importing [Vidhin's regex](https://github.com/Vidhin05/Releases-Regex/tree/main?tab=readme-ov-file#-raw-github-links-for-direct-import) into *Preferred Regex Patterns* to highlight streams from reputable release groups.
metadata.author: Tamtaro

definition.name: {stream.resolution::exists["{stream.resolution::replace('2160p','Â Â 4KÂ ')::replace('1440p','Â Â Â Â 2KÂ ')::replace('1080p','1080P')::replace('720p','720P')::replace('576p','576P')::replace('540p','540P')::replace('480p','480P')::replace('360p','360P')::replace('240p','240P')::replace('144p','144P')}"||"Â Â Â Â â°Â "]} {stream.type::replace('debrid','Â Â Â ')::replace('p2p','â½áµ–Â²áµ–â¾')::replace('live','â½Ë¡á¶¦áµ›áµ‰â¾')::replace('http','â½Ê·áµ‰áµ‡â¾')::replace('usenet','â½â¿á¶»áµ‡â¾')::replace('statistic','â½Ë¢áµ—áµƒáµ—Ë¢â¾')::replace('external','â½áµ‰Ë£áµ—â¾')::replace('error','â½áµ‰Ê³Ê³áµ’Ê³â¾')::replace('youtube','â½Ê¸áµ—â¾')}{service.cached::istrue["âš¡"||""]}{service.cached::isfalse["â³"||""]}{tools.newLine}{stream.quality::exists["Â Â Â Â Â \nâŒ©{stream.quality::title}âŒª "||""]}{stream.message::~Download["{tools.removeLine}\nâ€Ž "||""]}

excludedStreamExpressions: /*Seeders Filter (Uncached)*/ count(type(streams,'debrid','usenet')) > 0?  ( count(seeders(type(uncached(streams),'debrid'), 5)) < 5 ? [] :  merge(count(regexMatched(streams)) > 0 ? seeders(merge(regexMatched(negate(uncached(type(streams,'usenet')), uncached(streams)),'','Bad'), type(streams,'p2p')),0,5) : seeders(merge(negate(uncached(type(streams,'usenet')), uncached(streams)), type(streams,'p2p')),0,5) ) ): []

/*Seeders Filter (P2P)*/	 count(seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 5)) < 5 ? [] :  count(seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 50)) > 20? seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 0,50) : count(seeders(type(streams,'p2p'),25)) > 20? seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 0,25) : count(seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 10)) > 20? seeders(type(streams,'p2p'),0,10) : count(seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 1)) > 20? seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 0,1) : []

/*Anime Filter (4K & AI)*/ merge(queryType == 'anime.series' or queryType == 'anime.movie' ? negate(library(streams), visualTag(streams, 'AI')) : [], queryType == 'anime.series' and count(quality(resolution(streams, '2160p'), 'Bluray REMUX')) >0 ? [] : queryType == 'anime.series' ? negate(library(streams), resolution(streams, '2160p')) : [])

/*Cached Filter (High Quality)*/ merge( slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray REMUX'),'2160p','1440p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray REMUX'),'1080p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray REMUX'),'720p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray REMUX'),'576p','480p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray REMUX'),'Unknown'), 3),  slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray'),'2160p','1440p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray'),'1080p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray'),'720p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray'),'576p','480p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray'),'Unknown'), 3),  slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'WEB-DL'),'2160p','1440p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'WEB-DL'),'1080p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'WEB-DL'),'720p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'WEB-DL'),'576p','480p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'WEB-DL'),'Unknown'), 3),  slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'WEBRip'),'2160p','1440p'), 3),  slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'WEBRip'),'1080p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'WEBRip'),'720p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'WEBRip'),'576p','480p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'WEBRip'),'Unknown'), 3) )

/*Cached Filter (Low Quality)*/ merge( slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'HDRip','HC HD-Rip','DVDRip','HDTV'),'2160p','1440p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'HDRip','HC HD-Rip','DVDRip','HDTV'),'1080p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'CAM','TS','TC','SCR'),'2160p','1440p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Unknown'),'1080p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Unknown'),'720p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Unknown'),'576p','480p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(negate(library(streams), merge(cached(streams), type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Unknown'),'Unknown'), 3) )

/*Uncached Filter (All Quality)*/ merge( slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Bluray REMUX'),'2160p','1440p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Bluray REMUX'),'1080p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Bluray REMUX'),'720p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Bluray REMUX'),'576p','480p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Bluray REMUX'),'Unknown'), 3),  slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Bluray'),'2160p'), 3),  slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Bluray'),'1080p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Bluray'),'720p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Bluray'),'576p','480p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Bluray'),'Unknown'), 3),  slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'WEB-DL'),'2160p','1440p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'WEB-DL'),'1080p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'WEB-DL'),'720p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'WEB-DL'),'576p','480p','360p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'WEB-DL'),'Unknown'), 3),  slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'WEBRip'),'2160p','1440p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'WEBRip'),'1080p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'WEBRip'),'720p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'WEBRip'),'576p','480p','360p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'WEBRip'),'Unknown'), 3),  slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'HDRip','HC HD-Rip','DVDRip','HDTV'),'2160p','1440p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'HDRip','HC HD-Rip','DVDRip','HDTV'),'1080p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'HDRip','HC HD-Rip','DVDRip','HDTV'),'720p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'HDRip','HC HD-Rip','DVDRip','HDTV'),'576p','480p','360p','240p','144p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'HDRip','HC HD-Rip','DVDRip','HDTV'),'Unknown'), 3),  slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'CAM','TS','TC','SCR'),'2160p','1440p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'CAM','TS','TC','SCR'),'1080p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'CAM','TS','TC','SCR'),'720p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'CAM','TS','TC','SCR'),'576p','480p','360p','240p','144p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Unknown'),'1080p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Unknown'),'720p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Unknown'),'576p','480p','360p','240p','144p'), 3), slice(resolution(quality(uncached(streams),'Unknown'),'Unknown'), 3) )

/*Final Filter (Low Quality & Resolution)*/ merge(count(quality(negate(library(streams),merge(cached(streams),type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray REMUX','Bluray','WEB-DL','WEBRip')) >12? quality(negate(library(streams),streams),'HDRip','HC HD-Rip','DVDRip','HDTV','CAM','TS','TC','SCR'):  count(quality(negate(library(streams),merge(cached(streams),type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray REMUX','Bluray','WEB-DL','WEBRip','HDRip','HC HD-Rip','DVDRip','HDTV')) >12? quality(streams,'CAM','TS','TC','SCR'):[],  count(resolution(negate(library(streams),merge(cached(streams),type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'2160p','1440p','1080p')) >15? negate(library(streams), merge(type(uncached(streams),'debrid'), resolution(merge(type(streams, 'usenet','http','p2p'), type(cached(streams), 'debrid')),'720p','576p','480p','360p','240p','144p','Unknown'))):  count(resolution(negate(library(streams),merge(cached(streams),type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'2160p','1440p','1080p')) >12? negate(library(streams), merge(type(uncached(streams),'debrid'), slice(resolution(merge(type(streams, 'usenet','http','p2p'), type(cached(streams), 'debrid')),'720p','576p','480p','360p','240p','144p','Unknown'),3))):  count(resolution(negate(library(streams),merge(cached(streams),type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'2160p','1440p','1080p','720p')) >12? negate(library(streams), merge(type(uncached(streams),'debrid'), resolution(merge(type(streams, 'usenet','http','p2p'), type(cached(streams), 'debrid')),'576p','480p','360p','240p','144p','Unknown'))):  count(resolution(negate(library(streams),merge(cached(streams),type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'2160p','1440p','1080p','720p')) >9? negate(library(streams), merge(type(uncached(streams),'debrid'), slice(resolution(merge(type(streams, 'usenet','http','p2p'), type(cached(streams), 'debrid')),'576p','480p','360p','240p','144p','Unknown'), 3))):  count(resolution(negate(library(streams),merge(cached(streams),type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'2160p','1440p','1080p','720p')) >6? negate(library(streams), merge(type(uncached(streams),'debrid'), slice(resolution(merge(type(streams, 'usenet','http','p2p'), type(cached(streams), 'debrid')),'576p','480p','360p','240p','144p','Unknown'), 6))):  count(resolution(negate(library(streams),merge(cached(streams),type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'2160p','1440p','1080p','720p')) >3? negate(library(streams), merge(slice(type(uncached(streams),'debrid'), 6), slice(resolution(merge(type(streams, 'usenet','http','p2p'), type(cached(streams), 'debrid')),'576p','480p','360p','240p','144p','Unknown'), -1))):[] )
